name: TrapImagePlacementTypes
shortdesc: Options for trap placement between vector objects and bitmap images.

property.name: CENTER_EDGES
property.shortdesc: Creates a trap that straddles the edge between vector objects and bitmap images.

property.name: CHOKE
property.shortdesc: Causes vector objects to overlap abutting images.

property.name: IMAGE_NEUTRAL_DENSITY
property.shortdesc: Applies the same trapping rules as used elsewhere in the document. Note: When used to trap an object to a photograph, can result in noticeably uneven edges as the trap moves from one side of the edge to another.

property.name: IMAGES_OVER_SPREAD
property.shortdesc: Causes bitmap images to overlap the abutting objects.
